content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2019 Peach Bowl Packages

Experience the Peach Bowl your way. Our Sports Travel Specialists will work with you to personalize a 2019 Peach Bowl experience with your choice of first class hotels in Atlanta, your preferred tickets in Mercedes-Benz Stadium, and more. With a history dating back to 1968, the Peach Bowl is a highlight of bowl season and this year will act as a semifinal for the College Football Championship. Along with the incredible football, take advantage of Atlanta’s great restaurants, vibrant nightlife, and phenomenal shopping. Complete 2019 Peach Bowl packages available from $995 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2019 Peach Bowl

The first Peach Bowl was played in 1968 and has been played each year since in Atlanta. The game regularly sees in excess of 70,000 spectators, watching some of the top college players in action. Every third year, the Peach Bowl serves as a semifinal for the College Football Championship. This year’s game will be played on December 28, 2019 at Mercedes-Benz Stadium, its home since 2017.
